articles.description: Watch & follow live text updates from the final games of Group E as Ukraine face Belgium & Slovakia play Romania.
articles.title: Euro 2024 LIVE: Ukraine v s Belgium & Slovakia vs Romania - watch, listen & follow live text

articles.description: Gareth Southgate has said he is "oblivious" to outside criticism but will the fans' reaction to England's draw with Slovenia decide his future?
articles.title: Euro 2024: Will fan fury shape Gareth Southgate's future as England manager?

articles.description: Coach Matthew Mott says it is time for England to be "frontrunners" at the T20 World Cup and "throw the first punch" in Thursday's semi-final against India.
articles.title: T20 World Cup semi-finals: England want to 'throw first punch' against India

articles.description: Katie Boulter's impressive form on grass continues with a confident win over Jelena Ostapenko to reach the quarter-finals at Eastbourne.
articles.title: Eastbourne 2024: Katie Boulter Boulter outplays Jelena Ostapenko to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: In 2021, La Palma's volcanos erupted, issuing tonnes of molten rock and a reminder of the perilious nature of the island's premier running race.
articles.title: Transvulcania - the race on the rim of La Palma's volcanos

articles.description: Tammy Beaumont and Maia Bouchier score half-centuries as England thrash New Zealand by nine wickets in the opening one-day international in Durham.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Tammy Beaumont & Maia Bouchier lead hosts to dominant win in first ODI

articles.description: England midfielder Phil Foden "temporarily" leaves the Three Lions' Euro 2024 camp and returns to the UK for family reasons.
articles.title: Phil Foden: England midfielder 'temporarily' leaves Euro 2024 camp for family reasons

articles.description: Anthony Joshua will fight Daniel Dubois for the IBF world title in a battle of British heavyweights at Wembley Stadium in September.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Daniel Dubois: Heavyweights to fight for IBF world title in September

articles.description: South Africa head coach Rassie Erasmus defends captain Siya Kolisi after Racing 92 owner Jacky Lorenzetti made comments about the player's weight.
articles.title: South Africa v Ireland: Rassie Erasmus defends Siya Kolisi after weight comments

articles.description: Hungary forward Barnabas Varga says he is set for "a few weeks of rest" after being allowed home from hospital to recover from a serious injury suffered at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Hungary's Barnabas Varga discharged from hospital
